svg.text: The conception of individual, society, and humanity stand
in the substance of significance by moral autonomy, and
fall in the betrayal of inhumanity by moral heteronomy.
The individualism, socialism, and communism of peace and
dignity in the light of awareness. The cynicism, egoism,
and nihilism of conflict and war in the darkness of
ignorance, infidelity, and inferiority. Intellect and
insanity a milieu of ambiguity lost to the occasions of
cacophony and confusion that service the convenience of
A chaos that obscures the conception of intellect
necessary to the dominion of patience, reflection, peace,
and dignity. The realms of history as experience.
